workflows.name: Customer Onboarding
workflows.description: Automates the initial setup process for new customers including account creation and welcome sequences.

workflows.name: Lead Qualification
workflows.description: Automatically scores and qualifies incoming leads based on engagement and demographic data.

workflows.name: Invoice Processing
workflows.description: Streamlines invoice generation, approval workflows, and payment tracking.

workflows.name: Support Ticket Routing
workflows.description: Automatically routes support tickets to appropriate teams based on category and priority.

workflows.name: Marketing Campaign Sync
workflows.description: Synchronizes marketing campaign data across multiple platforms and channels.
